original_text: When his fellow servants saw what had taken place, they were greatly distressed, and they went and reported to their master all that had taken place.
korean_text: 그 동료들이 그것을 보고 몹시 딱하게 여겨 주인에게 가서 그 일을 다 알리니

sentences.original_text: When his fellow servants saw what had taken place
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 동료 종들이 일어난 일을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and they went and reported to their master
